I think, it will WORK ON WINDOWS 7 IF, you set up (in "properties" => "Compatibility") The compatibility mode to "Windows XP". Just try. I'm not shure, but it should, I'm on XP, and to MORE older games, I'm setting up compatibility to "windows 95"....
